audioText: Autrefois, je faisais du vélo tous les jours après l'école.
question: What did the speaker do when they were little?
options: They rode their bike every day after school
They played soccer with friends every afternoon
They did homework immediately after school
They watched TV every evening after dinner
explanation: The text states 'Autrefois, je faisais du vélo tous les jours après l'école' - In the past, I used to ride my bike every day after school. 'Faisais' is the imperfect form of 'faire' (to do/make), and 'autrefois' means 'in the past/formerly'.
